mainText: We are delighted to be hosting an open day for TPS Connects today. Come to our offices on Govan Road, Glasgow, to learn more about TPS Connects and enjoy barbeque, face painting and more fun activities. We also extend our warmest congratulations to the students completing our Connecting Citizens programme. Their graduation ceremony is being held between 1pm and 2pm and we'd be delighted if you celebrate with us.

titleText: A warm welcome to new colleagues
mainText: Turning Point Scotland is delighted to welcome our new colleagues from the North Ayrshire P.E.A.R. service. Staff are in head office today to kickstart their induction for this new prevention, early intervention and recovery service.

titleText: Calling on anyone who has used our services!
mainText: Calling on anyone who has used our services! Do you want to give back to your community? Volunteering could be your way to do this. Head to our TPS Connects open day and find out how to get involved. It's on Friday, 23rd August between 11am and 4pm at our offices at 54 Govan Road, Glasgow.
We're currently recruiting for 25 posts around Scotland. If you're looking for a change, check out our recruitment portal. Go to www.turningpointscotland.com to find out more.

titleText: Take a trip down memory lane
mainText: Like Marty McFly, you can now get back in time to see how T.P.S have grown, developed, and evolved since 1999. We've been raking through the archives and have created a timeline of the organisation's achivements as part of our 20th anniversary celebrations. You can add your own memories, thoughts and comments too! Visit www.turningpointscotland.com/timeline to take part.
